Browse the source code of netbsd/crypto/external/bsd/openssh/dist/sc25519.h

1/* $NetBSD: sc25519.h,v 1.2 2018/04/06 18:59:00 christos Exp $ */
2/* $OpenBSD: sc25519.h,v 1.3 2013/12/09 11:03:45 markus Exp $ */
3
4/*
5 * Public Domain, Authors: Daniel J. Bernstein, Niels Duif, Tanja Lange,
6 * Peter Schwabe, Bo-Yin Yang.
7 * Copied from supercop-20130419/crypto_sign/ed25519/ref/sc25519.h
8 */
9
10#ifndef SC25519_H
11#define SC25519_H
12
13#include "crypto_api.h"
14
15#define sc25519 crypto_sign_ed25519_ref_sc25519
16#define shortsc25519 crypto_sign_ed25519_ref_shortsc25519
17#define sc25519_from32bytes crypto_sign_ed25519_ref_sc25519_from32bytes
18#define shortsc25519_from16bytes crypto_sign_ed25519_ref_shortsc25519_from16bytes
19#define sc25519_from64bytes crypto_sign_ed25519_ref_sc25519_from64bytes
20#define sc25519_from_shortsc crypto_sign_ed25519_ref_sc25519_from_shortsc
21#define sc25519_to32bytes crypto_sign_ed25519_ref_sc25519_to32bytes
22#define sc25519_iszero_vartime crypto_sign_ed25519_ref_sc25519_iszero_vartime
23#define sc25519_isshort_vartime crypto_sign_ed25519_ref_sc25519_isshort_vartime
24#define sc25519_lt_vartime crypto_sign_ed25519_ref_sc25519_lt_vartime
25#define sc25519_add crypto_sign_ed25519_ref_sc25519_add
26#define sc25519_sub_nored crypto_sign_ed25519_ref_sc25519_sub_nored
27#define sc25519_mul crypto_sign_ed25519_ref_sc25519_mul
28#define sc25519_mul_shortsc crypto_sign_ed25519_ref_sc25519_mul_shortsc
29#define sc25519_window3 crypto_sign_ed25519_ref_sc25519_window3
30#define sc25519_window5 crypto_sign_ed25519_ref_sc25519_window5
31#define sc25519_2interleave2 crypto_sign_ed25519_ref_sc25519_2interleave2
32
33typedef struct
34{
35 crypto_uint32 v[32];
36}
37sc25519;
38
39typedef struct
40{
41 crypto_uint32 v[16];
42}
43shortsc25519;
44
45void sc25519_from32bytes(sc25519 *r, const unsigned char x[32]);
46
47void shortsc25519_from16bytes(shortsc25519 *r, const unsigned char x[16]);
48
49void sc25519_from64bytes(sc25519 *r, const unsigned char x[64]);
50
51void sc25519_from_shortsc(sc25519 *r, const shortsc25519 *x);
52
53void sc25519_to32bytes(unsigned char r[32], const sc25519 *x);
54
55int sc25519_iszero_vartime(const sc25519 *x);
56
57int sc25519_isshort_vartime(const sc25519 *x);
58
59int sc25519_lt_vartime(const sc25519 *x, const sc25519 *y);
60
61void sc25519_add(sc25519 *r, const sc25519 *x, const sc25519 *y);
62
63void sc25519_sub_nored(sc25519 *r, const sc25519 *x, const sc25519 *y);
64
65void sc25519_mul(sc25519 *r, const sc25519 *x, const sc25519 *y);
66
67void sc25519_mul_shortsc(sc25519 *r, const sc25519 *x, const shortsc25519 *y);
68
69/* Convert s into a representation of the form \sum_{i=0}^{84}r[i]2^3
70 * with r[i] in {-4,...,3}
71 */
72void sc25519_window3(signed char r[85], const sc25519 *s);
73
74/* Convert s into a representation of the form \sum_{i=0}^{50}r[i]2^5
75 * with r[i] in {-16,...,15}
76 */
77void sc25519_window5(signed char r[51], const sc25519 *s);
78
79void sc25519_2interleave2(unsigned char r[127], const sc25519 *s1, const sc25519 *s2);
80
81#endif
82
